attributes.action: request all members of parliament refrain from using non enviromentally friendly vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: members should lead by example and start using public transport, low emission vehicles or their legs. stop bleeting on about gas guzzlers when they are still using them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
